com.paypal.android.sdk.payments

Class PayPalAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalAuthorization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public final class PayPalAuthorization
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    Resulting information from PayPalFuturePaymentActivity. Most significantly, the authorization code that came back from PayPal when your user consented to future payments.
    Send PayPalAuthorization.toJSONObject() to your server.

      • getEnvironment

        public String getEnvironment()
        PayPal environment accessor.
        Returns:
        The PayPal environment on which the authorization was granted. This is the value provided to PayPalConfiguration.environment(java.lang.String).

      • getAuthorizationCode

        public String getAuthorizationCode()
        Authorization code accessor.
        Returns:
        The authorization code associated with this consent. This code should be communicated to your servers for use in future payments.

      • toJSONObject

        public JSONObject toJSONObject()
        Convert to JSON.
        Returns:
        The JSON object to send to your server.
